Name: Dead Man's Fault
About the game: This is a short (~30 minutes) first-person psychological horror game set in a deep, dark cave. Cave exploring is a common practice. But what happens when you overstep your boundaries? The suffocating jaws of a tight cave don't let go as easily as they grab hold of you. Deployed as part of a rescue effort, you must explore the depths of Deep Den Cave and discover what happened to the last explorer that ventured down its path. Don't get lost. Features A beautiful hand-crafted cave environment to navigate. First-person caving mechanics. You'll need to repel down ropes, throw flares, and crawl your way through the game. Scary events and suspenseful moments. 4 (?) Analog horror tapes to discover. A disturbing mystery for you to unravel.
